description: Amendments to planning permission dated 19 December 2018 (RN: 17/04575) for Variation of conditions 1 and 25 of planning permission dated 27 April 2014 (14/04252/FULL) for the erection of an eight storey building (with basement) to provide 53 bedroom hotel at lower ground, ground, first, second, third, and fourth floor levels and six residential units on the fifth, sixth and seventh floor levels, provision of plant and associated enclosure and solar panels at roof level; namely, changes to internal layout and external changes including relocation of entrance to hotel, change to party wall position, metal mesh to light well omitted above ground floor, first floor plant room enclosed, CHP pipes to run external to terrace, metal mesh over service year at first floor, modifications to roof top plant room, terrace balustrade changed from metal to glass, ventilation grilles added to windows, window proportions revised and obscure windows to be openable for maintenance purposes only, NAMELY, an increase in the height of the rooftop plant enclosure, setback of the rainwater pipes, alterations to the windows at second, third and fourth floor levels, a reduction in the overall height of the decorative gate, installation of a new louvre associated with the UKPN substation at basement level, installation of linear ventilation grilles above windows at the fifth, sixth and seventh floors along the west elevation, render along the east elevation at the sixth and seventh floor levels; internal alterations associated with the configuration of the hotel and removal of Condition 34.
